title: The Beauty of a Beast
description: Fandom: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero AcademiaRelationship: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou--------------------------------------------------Once upon a time a lonely beast lived in a manor deep in the forest. He dreamed of the day his true love appeared to break his curse... When a beauty finally appears in his life, it is not quite as he imagined. For who could have thought a beauty would be more of a beast.OrThe beauty and the beast AU nobody asked for but here it is.Words; 101655
author: starofjems
